alert.note: Alert for Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 02 at 1:06PM CST until March 04 at 11:15AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville affecting Hunt County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Caution should be exercised near the river as water begins to flow out of the banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM CST Thursday the stage was 5.2 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 15.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
